Module com.example.battleship
Package com.example.battleship.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.example.battleship.controller.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBattleShipGame
public class GameController extends Object implements IBattleShipGame
Main controller for the Battleship game. Handles game logic, AI turns, persistence, and observer notifications. Implements MVC architecture and Observer/Strategy patterns.
Since:
2025-12-07

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController()
      Constructs a new GameController with default settings. Initializes boards, fleet, and default AI strategy.

  • Method Details

    • loadGameFromSave

      public boolean loadGameFromSave()
      Loads a saved game from persistent storage.
      Returns:
      true if game loaded successfully, false otherwise

    • resetGame

      public void resetGame()
      Resets the game to initial state. Clears boards and reinitializes fleet.

    • setPlayerNickname

      public void setPlayerNickname(String nickname)
      Sets the player's nickname for score tracking.
      Parameters:
      nickname - The player's nickname

    • setOnMachineTurnFinished

      public void setOnMachineTurnFinished(Runnable callback)
      Sets callback for when machine turn finishes.
      Parameters:
      callback - The callback to execute

    • setDifficulty

      public void setDifficulty(String difficulty)
      Sets the AI difficulty level. IMPROVED: Resets strategy state when changing difficulty.
      Parameters:
      difficulty - "EASY", "MEDIUM", or "HARD"

    • getNextShipToPlace

      public Ship getNextShipToPlace()
      Gets the next ship to be placed.
      Returns:
      The next ship, or null if all ships are placed
